Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with delays at Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with delays at Kimball.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at Forest Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays at Forest Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Southbound Reroute near Michigan/Randolph
ShortDescription: SB 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via Randolph, State, Washington and Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via Randolph, State, Washington and Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/Randolph.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
